articles.author: Samuel Luckhurst
articles.title: Manchester United players turn on each other in defeat to Borussia Dortmund - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man United lost their final pre-season tour game to Borussia Dortmund at the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas.
articles.content: Sinning in Sin City from Manchester United. Omari Forson was hauled off, Brandon Williams was involved in a blazing row with Tom Heaton, Andre Onana rollocked Harry Maguire and three goals were shipp… [+4700 chars]
